description: A live stream polling bot. Viewers can vote on which items are sent to the multiworld!

apollago-0.1.0.description:
# Archipollago 0.1.0
A Twitch polling client where chat votes on what items are sent to the multiworld!

Please read `archipollago_en.md` for setup instructions.

Official Twitch polls are untested.
apollago-0.1.0.title: Archipollago 0.1.0

apollago-0.1.2.description:
A Twitch polling client where chat votes on what items are sent to the multiworld!

Fixes duplicate options in polls.

Please read `archipollago_en.md` for setup instructions.
apollago-0.1.2.title: Archipollago 0.1.2

apollago-0.1.3.description:
A Twitch polling client where chat votes on what items are sent to the multiworld!

Fixes bot stopping behavior. Reduced dependency package size.

If a previous version was installed, please install Archipelago again and install the smaller dependency package once more using the new instructions.

Please start your Archipelago Launcher with either `ap_launcher_ssl_fix.sh` for Linux/Mac or `ap_launcher_ssl_fix.bat` for Windows if you receive an SSL error.

Please read `archipollago_en.md` for setup instructions.
apollago-0.1.3.title: Archipollago 0.1.3
